<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Interweave Dispel](/Feats.aspx?ID=6116) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=824" />
<trait label="Spellshape" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=513" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 156 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1493) in your spell repertoire

</column>

---

You weave dispelling energy into a spell. If your next action is to cast a single-target spell against an enemy, and you either hit the enemy with the spell [attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=540) roll or the enemy fails its saving throw, you can cast [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1493) on the enemy as a free action, expending a spell slot as normal and targeting one spell effect affecting the enemy.
name: Interweave Dispel
